intro: Psychotria altsonii, commonly known as the Altson's psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Ecuador and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
